* Contact: Almos Varga - almos.varga (at) gmail (dot) com
* Make: MSI
* Brand: CR series
* Model: CR700X
* Website: http://eu.msi.com/index.php?func=proddesc&maincat_no=135&cat2_no=680&prod_no=1848
* Kernel Version: 2.6.31-14-generic

=== Current Issues ===
Ubuntu 9.10 (Karmic): The touchpad scroll does not work. This laptop has an Elantech touchpad, and Ubuntu recognizes as ''ImExPS/2 Generic Explorer Mouse''.

Ubuntu 10.04 (Lucid Lynx): To use the touchpad scroll you should only push the edges and not to move the fingers. For the vertical scrolling push the right top/bottom edge of the touchpad, for the horizontal scrolling push the bottom right/left edge of the touchpad.
